attributes.action: Stop testing all over England and in All education sectors
attributes.additional_details:
The testing is causing havoc. The testing does not cure and I'm afraid if testing doesn't stop we as a nation will be going around in circles. We get these symptoms every year, it is normal. Common cold has majority of the symptoms.
Testing them daily will also cause havoc because the kids will keep being sent home. We know what to do when kids are unwell & adults unwell we stay at home & use common sense. Like we have done all these years. Let's stop testing everywhere get life back to normal
attributes.background: As the restrictions are all gone on freedom Day July 19th, but testing should also be stopped every where in work places and in all education sectors such as primary schools, high schools, colleges and university. It is ruining our kids education and work life. People tired of this now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure if you want to stop regular testing for people without Covid symptoms or all testing. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
